articles.author: Eric Loveday
articles.title: How Uber, Lyft, Electrify America, EVgo, Tesla And Lack Of Knowledge Led To Chicago's EV Disaster - InsideEVs
articles.description: Chicago's much-publicized EV charging disaster is really more about lack of knowledge and an overwhelming amount of rideshare drivers than it is about Tesla or Superchargers.
articles.content:
The tale of Teslas being stranded in Chicago and unable to charge due to the frigid weather is only a small part of a much bigger story.
In order to find out exactly what the problem was, Kyle Conne… [+4468 chars]
